CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(How_Are_Customer_Details_Entered__c ) = "Entered in CRM", 3, IF(TEXT(How_Are_Customer_Details_Entered__c ) = "Entered in Tax Free Interface", 5, IF(TEXT(How_Are_Customer_Details_Entered__c ) = "Not Available", 0, 0)))
CustomField.label: How Are Customer Details EnteredR
